author: Kurt Sanders
releaseNotes:
• Integrates SmartLife (Tuya) Heated Towel Warmer Device from Dywarmic (https://www.dywarmic.com/) to Hubitat./n/n• This integration utilizes an API tuya devices exposes on the local network, i.e. not via the tuya servers, to control and read status from devices.

• This driver supports both 3.1-3.4 versions of the protocol.

• This device driver requires one to create a Tuya Developer account and obtain device authenticaion creditials.

• Instructions are available on Hubitat Community.
